title: Central A/C + Swimming Pool + Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 BA in Sherman Oaks
posting_body: ['Welcome to the Riverside Drive Apartments located in a prime area of Sherman Oaks moments from the 101 freeway and Fashion Square Mall as well as numerous boutiques and plazas, that line Ventura Boulevard.', 'Amenities we offer include a pool, controlled access entrances, and  air conditioning in all units.', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Community Amenities', '- Swimming Pool', '- Easy Access to the 101 Freeway', '- Close to Shopping and Restaurants', '- Laundry On-Site', '- Controlled Access/Gated', 'Apartment Amenities', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Dishwasher', '- Patio/Balcony*', '- Microwave', '- Gas Range', '- Stainless Steel Appliances*', '- Wood Inspired Floors*', '- Disposal', '- Carpeting', '- Central Air Conditioning', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats Welcome with an Additional Deposit.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', '13157 Riverside Drive', 'Sherman Oaks, CA', 'Interior Photos may not be on exact unit.', 'Price & availability are subject to change.', 'Square footage may not be exact.', 'Van Nuys, Studio City, Encino, Valley Glen, Toluca Lake, Universal City, Valley Village']
